content.raw:
Maybe i don't understand your problem, but why don't you use ``/usr/local/share/drcsim-2.3/gazebo_models/atlas_description/atlas``?

Btw i don't see how this is a blocker. ;) You can simply copy paste whatever you need to modify into your own package as well (I'm assuming you want to put atlas and polaris together or something like that?) if using the ``atlas`` package instead of ``atlas_description/urdf`` doesn't work for you.
content.html:
Maybe i don't understand your problem, but why don't you use /usr/local/share/drcsim-2.3/gazebo_models/atlas_description/atlas?

Btw i don't see how this is a blocker. ;) You can simply copy paste whatever you need to modify into your own package as well (I'm assuming you want to put atlas and polaris together or something like that?) if using the atlas package instead of atlas_description/urdf doesn't work for you.
